Text.val: Author: Stephan Huppertz
30.09.2013 SH SCR18438 Step1: Trailer row is now always written to file; Step10 No new LGCH is stored anymore, BAD150AZV
is submiited only ocne now in case of a non working day
18.07.2013 SH SCR18280 Changed update PI.DATE if empty; Step1: Header is now always written to file; Step10 Rewrote step
10.04.2013 SH SCR18072 Step2 Added range LGCH_PROGID <> BAD010
15.03.2013 SH SCR18017 Step2 Added range LGCH_PROGID <> BAD011 <> BAD022 <> BAD025
16.11.2012 SH SCR17657 Step3 Removed test Not (LGCC_PROGID = BAD201 and LGCC_ACCC_CHANGENO = 0)
14.11.2012 SH SCR17657 Extended update V.BRANCH
03.11.2012 GB SCR17659 Chnaged value of the parameter Step 10\BPH110\PI.COUNTRY from blank to RO
25.10.2012 SH SCR17528 Added GB324 to change encoding of outgoing files; Added task "TransactionLevel" to rollback database
database updates, done in step 2, in case file conversion fails
28.08.2012 SH SCR17462 Changed update of DR/CR Account in step 3/4. (new vitual v.TECHACC)
09.07.2012 SH SCR17414 Step10 Added test v.DATE <> EOM(v.DATE) to submit BAD150AZV in queue night 1
08.06.2012 SH SCR17372 Added step 10 Non working days
29.05.2012 GB SCR17234 Changed name of stored file
10.04.2012 SH SCR17234 Step3/4 Changed ouptput "BCE Amount" fields
05.04.2012 SH SCR17234 Changed filename into "DF” & PI.DATE (format YYMMDD) & ‘.AZV’
29.03.2012 SH SCR17116 Added subdirectory AZV; Changed update of
DR/CR Account in step 3/4.
... fixed size of row lenght (256 for header/trailing rows in step1/5; 768 for details rows in step 3/4)
-- Header record fields (1-7) --> Step 1
-- Detail record fields (1-21) --> Step3/4
-- Trailer record fields (1-5) --> Step 5
-- Used to calculate totals
-- Initializations
... get global variables
... prepare path/filename for CSV output file
... final path/filename
.. in case of directory does not exists --> MSGW
.. add subdirectory
-- Create directory if does not exist
... if create of new directorry failed --> MSGW
-- create outgoing file
... convert file to BU encoding (error handling is implemented in GB324)
... in case of errors within GB324 everything has to be rolled back (auto. if job is running on AS400,
triggered in GB324)
... always write the header record also if no data will be selected to write detail records
... always write the trailer record, also if no data is selected to write detail records
... amount alpha is used below to extract the decimal part (without rounding) from
... amount alpha is used below to extract the decimal part (without rounding) from
-- Calculate totals for trailer record (step 5)
... amount alpha is used below to extract the decimal part (without rounding)
... amount alpha is used below to extract the decimal part (without rounding)
-- Calculate totals for trailer record (step 5)
... submit BAD150AZV in queue night 1
